section.name: The Catalina Servlet Container
section.p: Catalina is the servlet container portion of Tomcat 4.0. It implements the Servlet Specification, version 2.3 (Proposed Final Draft 2), which is available for download here.

The navigation links to the left take you to portions of the Catalina documentation that is interesting to developers working on enhancing (or fixing bugs in) Tomcat. In addition, you will find the source code of the project to be liberally commented and easy to follow, once you become familiar with the overall architecture.
